articles.title: Summer of Gaming: The PC Gaming Announcements We're Most Excited About - IGN
articles.description:
This year's Summer of Gaming saw a treasure trove of reveals and announcements for PC gamers, from Resident Evil 4 being remade to quirky classics in the making like The Plucky Squire. Here are the ones we're most excited about.

Presented by Lenovo.
